## Public Member Functions

### getNameWithPrefix() {#aa1c9296fd511eb96bb487befbf5e7cea}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void Mangler::getNameWithPrefix (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &#42; GV, bool CannotUsePrivateLabel) const</>}>
Print the appropriate prefix and the specified global variable&#39;s name.

If the global variable doesn&#39;t have a name, this fills in a unique name for the global.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mangler-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mangler-h">Mangler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/mangler-cpp/#l00121">121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/mangler-cpp">Mangler.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### AnonGlobalIDs {#af21a21f12c3dd76b2ed24a1348d73484}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;const GlobalValue&#42;, unsigned&gt; llvm::Mangler::AnonGlobalIDs</>}
  labels = {["mutable"]}>
We need to give global values the same name every time they are mangled.

This keeps track of the number we give to anonymous ones.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mangler-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mangler-h">Mangler.h</a>.
